description: Denominators of coefficients in function a(x) such that a(a(x)) = exp(x) - 1.
references: R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, Cambridge, Vol. 2, 1999; see Problem 6.52.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..120
Dmitry Kruchinin, Vladimir Kruchinin, Method for solving an iterative functional equation A^{2^n}(x)=F(x), arXiv:1302.1986
mathematica: a[x_, n_] := Sum[c[k] x^k, {k, 0, n}] ;f[x_, n_] := Series[Exp[x] - 1, {x, 0, n}] // Normal;b[x_, n_] := Series[a[a[x, n], n], {x, 0, n}] // Normal;eq[n_] := Thread[CoefficientList[f[x, n] - b[x, n], x] == 0] // Rest;c[0] = 0; so[3] = Solve[eq[3], {c[1], c[2], c[3]}] // First;so[n_] := so[n] = Solve[eq[n] /. Flatten[Table[so[k], {k, 3, n - 1}]], c[n]] // FirstArray[c, 19, 0] /. Flatten[Table[so[k], {k, 3, 19}]] // Denominator(* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jun 08 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 22 2000
